description:
My place is close to Buses, Trains, local restaurants and grocery stores. You’ll love my place because of the location, the coziness, It's walking distance to Maimonides Hospital, Sunset park and local schools and parks. Not far from Park Slope, Bay ridge and Dyker heights. 40 minutes to down town manhattan. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets).

One queen mattress in each bedroom and a Futon in the living room. I have minimal furniture and decor so its easy to maintain and keep it uncluttered and clean. 
Fresh linens and toiletries are provided. 
Complimentary bottles water, coffee and tea.

I'm usually not around but I'm just a text away...

Walking distance to Transit, Sunset Park and bodegas 
Nearby play grounds, Asian Fusion and Pizza restaurants.

Close to B70 and B11 buses and the D train

As of now No TV or cable. Wifi only.
name: Newly Renovated Two Bedroom one bathroom
review: Super. Allez y vite. Bon emplacement . Appartement propre et surtout lily formidable et arrangeante. N'hésitez pas le meilleur rapport qualité prix de New York.
